About Us

ALL MAKES ENGINEERING SERVICES (AMES) is a wholly Ghanaian owned legally incorporated limited liability company and duly licensed auto repair services centre with a SECURED, STANDARD and WELL-POSITIONED facilities in the central and busy district of Kokrobite – Tuba, off the Kasoa highway and Lapaz-Nyamekye respectively. We are an auto services company that aims to become one of the leading auto repair garages across the nation through our team of certified and highly experienced auto repair engineers and technicians. At All Makes Engineering Services, our clients’ interest is our top most priority thus all our actions are guided by moral values and professional ethics.

Our Vision

Our vision is to establish a standard and world class auto repair garage whose services and brand will not only be accepted in Accra- but also other cities in Ghana.

Our Mission

Our mission is to provide professional auto repair services , training and auto repair related services that will assist businesses, individuals, households and non-profit organizations who owns automobiles, by ensuring that their automobiles are always in good shape. We want to build an auto repair garage that can favorably compete with other leading brands in the automobile maintenance and repair services industry.

Services
  • Mechanical Repairs
  • Electrical Repairs
  • General Vehicle Maintenance
  • General Servicing
  • Body Works and Spraying
  • Automobile Training
  • Vehicle Hiring
  • Export of vehicle parts
  • Import of vehicle parts

BRANDS
